definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The company describes its process as a 'human photocopier'.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司將其描述爲人類的複印機。

sentences.english: The categories of the lubricated duplicators are intricate.
sentences.chinese: 那些潤滑過的複印機的種類錯綜複雜。

sentences.english: What abut operating the fax and duplicators？
sentences.chinese: 你會發傳真和使用複印機嗎？

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of October 10 for business copiers.
sentences.chinese: 感激貴圓10月10日閉於商用複印機的詢函。

sentences.english: Xerox' is a proprietary name and may not be used by other makers of photocopiers.
sentences.chinese: 施樂＇爲專利名稱，製造複印機的其他廠家不得采用。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of October 10 for business copiers.
sentences.chinese: 感謝貴方10月10日關於商用複印機的詢函。

sentences.english: A: Well, I think I've got the copier running. I pressed the button but nothing came out.
sentences.chinese: 我想我已經開了複印機，但是按了按鈕沒反映。
複印機打印出來是二維的。

sentences.english: A copier that has been used a lot often has some dark smudges.
sentences.chinese: 複印機經常使用常會出現黑色的髒污。

sentences.english: Please quickly put these duplicating papers into the duplicator.
sentences.chinese: 你快把這些複印紙裝入複印機。

sentences.english: Well, I think I've got the copier running. I pressed the button but nothing came out.
sentences.chinese: 我想我已經開了複印機，但是按了按鈕沒反映。

sentences.english: I can operate a facsimile machine and a photostat.
sentences.chinese: 我還會操作使用複印機。

sentences.english: I need a trade copier system for MT4.
sentences.chinese: 我需要的MT4交易複印機系統。

sentences.english: The photocopier This makes copies, using a mirror, a roller and special black powder.
sentences.chinese: 複印機用一面鏡子，一個滾筒和專門的黑粉可以複印。

sentences.english: The company describes its process as a “human photocopier”.
sentences.chinese: 該公司形容這種工序爲“人體複印機。”

definition: to plan a military mission on a sand table (idiom)/to rehearse a planned action or activity/to conduct a dry run
Cona county, Tibetan: Mtsho sna rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
